thread.title: Excellent Boutique Hotel -
thread.title_full: Excellent Boutique Hotel - Review of Hotel 7 Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michalis Z
title: Excellent Boutique Hotel -
text: Visited Paris for three days and stayed at Hotel 7 Eiffel. Beautiful boutique hotel, modern and clean, very friendly staff. The neighbourhood is very quiet and safe and all amenities are near by. Metro just 2 minutes walking distance and from there 10 minutes max to Eiffel Tower. We had a very pleasant experience there and we will go back again for sure!
